item.title: Acamar for Clinical Trials
item.description: Acamar was the code name for an effort led by a leadin pharmaceutical to develop a new platform for clinical trials - one which is more responsive to business needs than the incumbent offerings, and which supports trials that are significantly faster, efficient, and more transparent.
